===== Conditions ===== 
{{for revision 1.03}}
==== Example Usage ====
This is a container element for conditions.  Declared through the following yes/no (1/0) value stating whether there are conditions attached to the activity.

For no conditions:
<code xml>
<conditions attached="0" />
</code>

For conditions:

<code xml>
<conditions attached="1">
....
</conditions>
</code>
